data.author: David Cesarino

changelog.release_notes:
- New support for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel.
- Waves and winds conditions at the moment.
- Tide height indication by color as well (Time e Time Steel).
- New, more modern and intuitive look.
- Requires Pebble updated to firmware 3.9 or above.
- Requires Android app updated to version 7.1 or above.

English version, supports firmware 2.0.0.

Fixed text layers boundaries when text is taller/wider than the previous boundary.

data.description:
This app allows your Pebble to show updated data of tides, waves and wind conditions for various locations in Brazil, in an effortless and intuitive way, with colors that represent the height of the tide, providing immediate feedback, and following international color standards for weather and oceanic data.

Install now and you won't regret.

Requirements:

- Pebble with firmware update 3.9 or above.
- Android device with app Tide Tables Brazil version 7.1 or above.
- Active Bluetooth connection with device.

Version in english. For portuguese, search for “Tábua de Mares Brasil” (Versão em inglês. Para português, pesquise por “Tábua de Mares Brasil").

data.title: Tide Tables Brazil
